Character Sheet V1.Passive: May choose to leave combat after taking damage, does not receive Points for future kills in round.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest if there there is one enemy you may enter combat at the beginning of a round attacking a target of your choice.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, name a unit, the first time you kill that unit will yield one extra point and fully heal your character.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: The first time you take damage in combat, only take half damage.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest when you attack you may split the damage among units as you like
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, when you attack roll two dice, choose which to keep as your damage. If they match, keep both.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: You can look at one players action card before action cards are revealed. You can choose to change your own action card before cards are revealed.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per a rest, before action cards are revealed you can randomly swap a players action card.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Deceptive Gambit - Once per rest, unleash a deceptive gambit to throw off your opponents. Each player reveals their action card simultaneously. Then, secretly choose a new action card and reveal it. Your chosen action card takes effect instead of the previously revealed one.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Once per round if you are not in the lead steal a point from a gladiator
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest if you have no Battle Trait cards you can steal one card from someone with two Battle trait cards
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, choose a Gladiator and how many points you would like to steal from them. Both Gladiators roll a dice if the difference matches the number of points you choose, steal that many points.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Start with a random Battle Traint card. You can have up to three Battle Traits.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, before action cards are revealed name a card, gain a point for each card that matches what was named.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, choose all action cards for Gladiators.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Increase damage by one each time you kill an enemy (last hit)
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Whenever you defend in combat you may choose to redirect 2 damage to a another unit other than the attacker.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, roll a dice, deflect X amount of damage to another unit of your choice where X is the number rolled

Character Sheet V1.Passive: When Defending you block 2 damage and can heal any one target 2.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, choose any number of units to gain advantage on their rolls for their next roll (roll double dice, keep the higher roll)
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, roll 3 dice, one will heal, one will deal damage, one will award points. Distribute them as you like.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Every time you heal a unit in Battle, gain a point.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, heal a target for 2 health, repeat this once.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: When you or another Gladiator is knocked out roll dice, 4+ the unit is revived with 50% health (rounded down) still lose points but not stunned.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Don't lose points for being stunned, gain a point each time you are stunned.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, force a target to attack you, they take the damage you are dealt plus your attack mod.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, reduce your health to 0, deal damage equal to the health lost plus your attack mod. Any units stunned in this way are stunned before you are.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Passive: Animal Bond - The Beast Master starts the game with a loyal companion. The companion assists in battles, dealing 1 additional damage with each attack.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Call of the Wild - Once per rest, summon a temporary beast companion to aid in combat. The beast companion has 6 health and deals 2 damage with each attack. It remains in play until defeated or the battle ends.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Beast Horde - Once per rest, summon a horde of beasts to overwhelm your enemies. Summon 3 temporary beast companions with 4 health each. They deal 2 damage with each attack and remain in play until defeated or the battle ends.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Unyielding Rage - Whenever the Barbarian is knocked out, they immediately regain 4 health and return to battle with 2 attack mod for the next round.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Frenzied Assault - Once per rest, enter a state of frenzied assault. For the next two rounds, the Barbarian's attack mod is increased by 2. However, the Barbarian cannot use Defend actions during this time.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Devastating Cleave - Once per rest, unleash a devastating cleave attack. Deal 5 damage to all monsters and gladiators in the battle. This attack cannot be modified by Battle Traits.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Divine Protection - The Paladin has a natural resistance to damage. Whenever they take damage, reduce it by 2 (minimum of 1).
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Shield of Justice - Once per rest, activate the Shield of Justice. The Paladin gains 4 temporary health that cannot be healed, and their attack mod is increased by 2 for the next round.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest, call upon divine powers to intervene in the battle. Fully heal the Paladin and all friendly conscious gladiators, remove all negative effects, and gain 3 temporary health. Additionally, all monsters in the battle lose 2 health.

Character Sheet V1.Passive: Open for Business: When training you can take an Item OR a Battle Trait. When entering battle If you do not have any items draw 3 items, pick 1 and shuffle the rest back into the deck.
Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest discard an item and choose one of the following gain 3 points, heal 3, add 3 to your attack, or allow your other team member to each draw 1 item.
Character Sheet V1.Ultimate: Once per rest choose a character with an Item, they must give you 5 points OR discard an Item OR discard a Battle Trait.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: May choose to leave combat after taking damage, does not receive Points for future kills in round.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest if there there is one enemy you may enter combat at the beginning of a round attacking a target of your choice.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Once per rest, the Assassin can disappear into the shadows, becoming undetectable and leaving combat. They do not receive points for future kills in the round.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, name a unit, the first time you kill that unit will yield one extra point and fully heal your character.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: The first time you take damage in combat, only take half damage.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest when you attack you may split the damage among units as you like
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Rain of Arrows - Once per rest, unleash a barrage of arrows upon your enemies. Deal 3 damage to each monster in the battle. If there are 4 or more monsters, increase the damage to 5.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, when you attack roll two dice, choose which to keep as your damage. If they match, keep both.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: You can look at one players action card before action cards are revealed. You can choose to change your own action card before cards are revealed.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per a rest, before action cards are revealed you can randomly swap a players action card.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Shadow Manipulation - Once per rest, manipulate shadows to confuse your enemies. Before action cards are revealed, choose two players. Swap their action cards with each other.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Deceptive Gambit - Once per rest, unleash a deceptive gambit to throw off your opponents. Each player reveals their action card simultaneously. Then, secretly choose a new action card and reveal it. Your chosen action card takes effect instead of the previously revealed one.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Once per round if you are not in the lead steal a point from a gladiator
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest if you have no Battle Trait cards you can steal one card from someone with two Battle trait cards
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Once per rest, disappear from sight and avoid damage. For the next two rounds, you cannot be targeted by attacks or abilities. You can still attack and use abilities.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, choose a Gladiator and how many points you would like to steal from them. Both Gladiators roll a dice if the difference matches the number of points you choose, steal that many points.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Start with a random Battle Traint card. You can have up to three Battle Traits.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, before action cards are revealed name a card, gain a point for each card that matches what was named.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: War Cry - Once per rest, rally your allies with a mighty war cry. All conscious gladiators gain 2 temporary health and their attack mods are increased by 1 for the next two rounds.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, choose all action cards for Gladiators.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Increase damage by one each time you kill an enemy (last hit)
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Whenever you defend in combat you may choose to redirect 2 damage to a another unit other than the attacker.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Whirlwind Slash - Once per rest, unleash a whirlwind of slashes. Deal damage equal to your attack mod to all monsters and gladiators in the battle.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, roll a dice, deflect X amount of damage to another unit of your choice where X is the number rolled

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: When Defending you block 2 damage and can heal any one target 2.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, choose any number of units to gain advantage on their rolls for their next roll (roll double dice, keep the higher roll)
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Melody of Inspiration - Once per rest, inspire your allies with a captivating melody. All conscious gladiators gain 2 temporary health and draw 1 additional Battle Trait card.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, roll 3 dice, one will heal, one will deal damage, one will award points. Distribute them as you like.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Every time you heal a unit in Battle, gain a point.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, heal a target for 2 health, repeat this once.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Frantic Prayer (non AI): Once per a rest, roll a dice, heal a target 1 health, repeat X times.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: When you or another Gladiator is knocked out roll dice, 4+ the unit is revived with 50% health (rounded down) still lose points but not stunned.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Don't lose points for being stunned, gain a point each time you are stunned.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest, force a target to attack you, they take the damage you are dealt plus your attack mod.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, reduce your health to 0, deal damage equal to the health lost plus your attack mod. Any units stunned in this way are stunned before you are.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Passive: Animal Bond - The Beast Master starts the game with a loyal companion. The companion assists in battles, dealing 1 additional damage with each attack.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Call of the Wild - Once per rest, summon a temporary beast companion to aid in combat. The beast companion has 6 health and deals 2 damage with each attack. It remains in play until defeated or the battle ends.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Taming Mastery - Once per rest, harness your mastery over beasts. Choose a monster in the battle and attempt to tame it. Roll a dice, and if the result is 4 or higher, the monster becomes your temporary ally for the remainder of the battle. The monster retains its original health and attack values, but its attacks are directed towards other monsters.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Beast Horde - Once per rest, summon a horde of beasts to overwhelm your enemies. Summon 3 temporary beast companions with 4 health each. They deal 2 damage with each attack and remain in play until defeated or the battle ends.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Unyielding Rage - Whenever the Barbarian is knocked out, they immediately regain 4 health and return to battle with 2 attack mod for the next round.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Frenzied Assault - Once per rest, enter a state of frenzied assault. For the next two rounds, the Barbarian's attack mod is increased by 2. However, the Barbarian cannot use Defend actions during this time.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Unleashed Fury - Once per rest, tap into your primal rage and unleash an unstoppable fury. For the next two rounds, your attack mod is increased by 3, and your attacks ignore any defensive abilities or modifiers of the target. However, you cannot use Defend actions during this time.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Devastating Cleave - Once per rest, unleash a devastating cleave attack. Deal 5 damage to all monsters and gladiators in the battle. This attack cannot be modified by Battle Traits.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Divine Protection - The Paladin has a natural resistance to damage. Whenever they take damage, reduce it by 2 (minimum of 1).
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Shield of Justice - Once per rest, activate the Shield of Justice. The Paladin gains 4 temporary health that cannot be healed, and their attack mod is increased by 2 for the next round.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate Generated: Righteous Retribution - Once per rest, channel your righteous fury and deliver a powerful blow. Choose a target player or monster. Deal damage equal to your current health to the chosen target. If the target is defeated by this attack, gain 3 points. This attack cannot be modified by Battle Traits.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest, call upon divine powers to intervene in the battle. Fully heal the Paladin and all friendly conscious gladiators, remove all negative effects, and gain 3 temporary health. Additionally, all monsters in the battle lose 2 health.

Copy of Character Sheet V1.Passive: Open for Business: When training you can take an Item OR a Battle Trait. When entering battle If you do not have any items draw 3 items, pick 1 and shuffle the rest back into the deck.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ability: Once per rest discard an item and choose one of the following gain 3 points, heal 3, add 3 to your attack, or allow your other team member to each draw 1 item.
Copy of Character Sheet V1.Ultimate 2: Once per rest choose a character with an Item, they must give you 5 points OR discard an Item OR discard a Battle Trait.

Items.Description: Gain one point, heal one point
When defending block 1 additional damage.
If you negative points when the game ends, you win.
Target hero loses one pint and one health point.
The next time you roll a dice, choose the number instead
Incrase your attack mod by 1
Play with your cards revealed, when you again one or more points, gain that many plus 1.
You may activate this before combat to fight alongside monsters in combat
Whenever you are stunned lose an extra point. You have -1 point (this can drop you below 0 points)
Target 3 units, these untis heal 2 health points and if able to gain 2 points.
Restore 3 health points to target unit.
When defending, block the next 2 damage.
Gain an extra point whenever you gain points through an action or ability.
Increase your attack mod by 1. If you successfully attack, the target loses 1 additional health point.
Remove target from battle
Whenever you successfully defend against an attack, the attacker takes 1 damage.
Once per rest, predict the outcome of a dice roll. If correct, gain 2 points.
The next time you attack, double your attack mod for that attack.
Once per rest, become invisible until the start of your next turn. During this time, you cannot be targeted.
Activate this before combat to scare away all monsters, canceling their participation in the battle.
Trade in 2 items, draw 3 items. Choose one and shuffle the remaining back into the deck
Destroy all items and Battle Trait cards you possess
Increase your max health by 1

Battle Trait.Description: Remove a player of your choice from Battle. They gain a point.
Only play after a Gladiator is knocked out. Roll a dice and add the value to your Health and Attack until the end of combat.
Only play after defeating a unit. Gain 2 points and 2 Health.
Look at a player's Action Card before it is revealed. You can change yours afterwards.
The next time you are knocked out, instead set your health to 2.
Negate the effect of another card (Monster or Battle Traits).
Heal to full Health.
Deal 1 damage to all opposing units.

Battle Trait.Card Title: What’s It Got in Its Pockets
Battle Trait.Description: Roll a dice, steal X points from a unit, where X is the dice value.
Steal 1 point from a player and a battle trait or item card.
Choose a player. They must copy your Action card.
You and another player gain 1 Block for the rest of combat.
Only use if you have more than 1 Health. Reduce your Health to 1 and add +3 to your next attack.
Target any unit. They can attack any unit.
Your attacks hit all enemies this combat.
The next time you Attack, Attack again. You can choose another target.
Deal 3 damage to up to 3 units of your choice.
Change your Action or Combat action card to another player's.
Swap Action or Combat action cards with another player.
Whenever you are attacked this combat, the attacker takes 1 damage.
Gain immunity from everything for one Combat round.

Battle Trait.Card Title: You Guys Are The Real Heroes
Battle Trait.Description: No Hero abilities can be used this Round. Hero abilities cannot be used in response to this. Hero abilities are "sorcery" speed unless swapping before combat (i.e., Thief).
Add 2 Block to any target.
Only play if you are leveled up and in Last Place. Gain 8 points.
Target player does not gain points the next instance they would.
Force a player to take the Rest action.
Negate the effect of another card (Monster or Battle Traits).
Target a non-stunned player. They must take the Battle Action this round.
No Battle Traits cards can be played in response to this card or this round. Item effects are nullified this round.
Play only at the beginning of Normal Battles. Fight alongside the Monster cards. Same rules for targeting as Gladiator Battles. Gain 5 points for winning.
All players can choose to roll a dice. The highest roll wins 1 point for each player that rolled a dice. (Ties for first re-roll only).
Play before an event card is drawn, Gladiator Battle!

Monsters.Description: Whoever kills me heals 5 points, all Resting heroes gain 2 points
Draw another monster card
When defeated, all fighting Gladiators draw an Item
No Battle Traits can be played this combat
Heal all fighting Gladiators 1
Gladiators must attack me, draw another monster card
All Gladiators I damage must discard an Item or Battle Trait card, draw another monster card
If not destroyed after 1 round, discard and deal 5 damage to all fighting Gladiators
If I deal damage, all fighting Gladiators take 2 damage
When defeated, all fighting Gladiators draw an Item
Whoever defeats me draw one item, items cannot be used or actived this combat.
Damage cannot be Defended
All Gladiators draw an item. Whoever kills me gains 2 points but loses 3 life, you cannot be knocked out this way.
Draw another monster card
When defeated, all fighting Gladiators draw an Item
If not destroyed after 1 round, discard and deal 5 damage to all fighting Gladiators, draw 1
Whoever defeats me refreshes their Ultimate (if you do not have an Ultimate, level up instead)
Whenever a unit dies, draw a Monster (ignore any additional draw effects)
Whenever this monster damages a Gladiator, that Gladiator loses 1 Attack till combat ends
At the start of each combat round, roll a 6-sided dice. On a 1, all Gladiators are stunned and cannot perform actions this round.
Increase Attack by 1 each combat round. All Gladiators must attack me.
Whenever this monster attacks, heal 2 life
X = 10 or highest point value among fighting Gladiators, whichever is higher
Attack individual with highest point value
Attack First. Attack mods are ignore while I am in Combat
Reduce damage I take by 2
Draw 3 Monster cards, all Gladiators can draw an Item or a Battle Trait
When revealed, all Gladiators with over 20 points must roll a dice, anyone who rolls a 1 is knocked out and loses 3 points. Discard this card after the effect resolves.

Event.Description: All Gladiators who enter battle may discard an Item to draw another item
All Gladiators who enter battle may draw an item if they do not have any items.
All Gladiators must participate in this Battle, Draw an extra Monster card
Attack Mods are ignored this Battle
Can't Defend this Battle
HP and Attack Mod + 2 for this round
Increase cheer by 1
All players resting this round get 1 point
All players who Battle this round gain 1 point. You can change your Gladiator Action card.
Monsters deal 1 extra damage
Gladiator Battle!
Swap your Gladiator Action card blindly
Discard a Battle Trait card if you have one
The Gladiator with the lowest point value gains a point
All Gladiators deal +2 damage for this battle
No Hero abilities can be used this round.
All Gladiators have their Defense reduced by 1 for this battle
All Gladiators draw an Item card from the treasure deck
All Gladiators' abilities are immediately refreshed (Ultimate too if leveled up)
Each Gladiator rolls a dice. On a 1 or 2, they lose 2 HP; on a 3 or 4, they gain 2 HP; on a 5 or 6, they gain 2 points
The first Gladiator to be knocked out instead has their health set to 1 and gains a point. Draw an extra Monster card.
Draw additional 3 Monster cards. All battling Gladiators gain +2 Attack Mod and draw an Item.
Gladiators have advantage on damage rolls this battle. Increase cheer by 1. Draw an extra Monster card when Battle starts.
Draw an extra monster card. Gladiators can attack any targets

Boss.Name: Mushroom King
Boss.Description: Pull 3 Mushroom Knights from the Monster deck or discard pile, add them to Combat

Boss.Name: Serpent Empress
Boss.Description: Whenever a Gladiator damages the Serpent Empress, they lose 2 HP due to venomous retaliation
